title: aSTa siddhi
sahitya:
aSTa siddhi aDaivOm anaivarum


anupallavi

  vaTTa ulagilE tan vashamAdalE vasitvam mArilAt-tAnE tAn AdalE Ishatvam


caraNam 1    Anavam tEidalE aNimAvAm uLLE anbaip-perukkalE garimAvAm tuLLum
mAn manam aDakkalE lahimAvAm tUya vAimai uNarvadE mahimAvAm enrum
    caraNam 2    aghamughappaDuvadE prApti sarvAttuma arivE prakAmyam arindu payiluvOm
ihapara sukhamellAm idaya guhAtmanAi irundapaDi irundE arundum paramAnandam
